```{r}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(writexl)
library(stringr)
library(rstanarm)
```

```{r}
prem <- read_excel("EPL_Payroll.xlsx")
```

```{r}
x <- prem |>
  select("Season", "Rk", "Squad", "Annual Wages", "Standing") |>
  mutate(annual = str_extract(`Annual Wages`, "\\$[0-9,]+")) |>
  mutate(annual = as.numeric(gsub("[$,]", "", annual))) |>
  select(-`Annual Wages`)

```

```{r}
x
```


```{r}
fit_1 <- stan_glm(Standing ~ Rk,
                  data = x,
                  family = gaussian,
                  refresh = 0)
```

```{r}
fit_1
```
